env: ${info_env}
version: ${info_env}

panels.title: Total Send Attempts

panels.title: Accepted Sends

panels.title: Deferred Sends

panels.title: Bounced Sends

panels.description: How many send attempts were tried per second for each queue
panels.title: Send Attempts by Queue

panels.description: How many send attempts were failed per second for each queue
panels.title: Failed Attempts by Queue

panels.title: PostgreSQL Connections

panels.description: Number of pending emails in each queue
panels.title: Pending Emails in Queue

panels.title: Webhooks

panels.title: Total Sent Webhooks

panels.title: Successful Webhooks

panels.description: Number of webhooks deferred to be retried later
panels.title: Deferred Webhooks

panels.description: Number of failed webhooks (after all retries).
panels.title: Failed Webhooks

panels.title: DNS Queries

panels.title: Successful DNS Queries

panels.title: NX DNS Queries

panels.title: Incoming Mails

panels.title: Bounce Mails

panels.title: Feedback Loop Mails

panels.title: Unknown Mails

panels.title: Requests by Endpoint
